section.title: UCC integration packages
section.simpara: This section lists all changes to ucc integration packages, i.e. packages that are installed on Univention Corporate Server.

listitem.simpara: Improved image toolkit support for image joinscripts with sequence numbers. Image joinscripts created since this version will be created with a 95[filename] prefix (Bug 32136).
Updated example files for rev3 images (Bug 32136).

section.title: UCC client packages
section.para: Information about errata updates released for UCC clients can be found at For UCC 1.0-rev3 the following errata updates have been released.

listitem.simpara: The udev handling for ATA cdrom devices has been fixed (Bug 31685).
The udev script now tries to speed up ATA cdrom devices with the eject tool. Problems with changing CD/DVDs in a drive were fixed (Bug 31713).

Two new UCR variables have been added to pre-configure proxy settings for firefox and KDE on UCC clients (Bug 31905).
ucc/proxy/http - URL to the proxy server ucc/proxy/autoconfig/url - URL to the proxy pac
The firefox proxy settings are now forced with 'lockPref' in the firefox configuration file (Bug 32580).
The monolithic UCR template for /etc/pam.d/lightdm has been changed into a multifile UCR template (Bug 31409).
This update fixes a bug in univention-lightdm that deletes the lightdm pam config during update (Bug 32119).

The new package univention-ucc-cifshome-pam-mount installs a mechanism that automatically mounts a CIFS share as home directory during user login. Server, share name and mount options may be defined via the UCR variables ucc/mount/cifshome/server, ucc/mount/cifshome/share and ucc/mount/cifshome/options. (Bug 32057).
This new package provides italc for Univention Corporate Client (Bug 30830). More information can be found in the UCS@School user manual.
univention-ucc-printerconfig allows to configure cups servers with the UCR variable ucc/cups/server (Bug 32056).

The new package univention-ucc-ucsschool-integration is a meta package and installs all required packages for using UCC with UCS@school (Bug 30829). For ucc clients with UCS@school integration dns_lookup_kdc is used in krb5.conf (by unsetting the UCR variable kerberos/kdc in the UCS@SCHOOL integration join script).
The template for the krb5.conf config file now also supports dns_lookup_kdc option (Bug 32080).
